title: Staff Software Engineer
description: Staff Software Engineer in the San Francisco Bay Area.

title: Executive Board Member & DCCC Delegate (ADEM)
description: Serving as an elected Executive Board Member (since Mar 2025) and ADEM Delegate (since Jan 2021).

title: Open Government Commissioner
description: Serving as an Open Government Commissioner for the City of Alameda.

title: Software Engineer
description: Early member of Fuchsia OS team. Worked on core systems, drivers, toolchains, Bluetooth stack, developer tools/frameworks (Rust, C++, C, Swift, Dart, Go). Also worked on Chrome, Android, and other projects.

title: Principal Software Engineer & Developer Evangelist
description: Lead developer on Apportable/Tengu SDKs (Objective-C/Swift to Android/other platforms). Ported/reimplemented Objective-C runtime, CoreFoundation, Foundation, etc. Forked LLVM/Clang. Also served as Developer Evangelist.

title: Lead iOS Developer
description: First employee and lead iOS developer for a restaurant reservation system.

title: Founder
description: Startup developing mobile apps for local information sharing.

title: Senior Software Engineer (TL)
description: Working as part of the Education Technology division, focusing on the development of the latest generation of TI graphing calculators and educational software.

title: Applications Engineer
description: Designed and deployed double blind email services with web based frontends. Also was in charge of Win32 and Unix service integration and development in our division.

title: Software Engineer
description: Software and Systems Engineer for a mid-sized ISP.

title: Software Developer
description: Mobile (Palm/PocketPC) and Web based software development for medical practice management software.
